mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER (ID, PASSWORD, USERNAME, EMAIL, PHONE, BIRTHDATE, ADDRESS, ROLE) VALUES (#{id}, #{password}, #{username}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{birthDate}, #{address}, #{role})
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET PASSWORD = #{password}, USERNAME = #{username}, EMAIL = #{email}, PHONE = #{phone}, BIRTHDATE = #{birthDate}, ADDRESS = #{address}, ROLE = #{role} WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER WHERE ID = #{id} AND PASSWORD = #{password}
